headline: Piper Sandler Lifts Coterra Energy Inc. (CTRA)’s Price Target to $39, Maintains Overweight Rating
summary: Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) is among the 13 Best S&P 500 Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts. On August 14, Piper Sandler analyst Mark Lear lifted the stock’s price target to $39 from $37, while maintaining an Overweight rating for its shares. The firm noted the challenging investing environment in the E&P sector, […]
